listing_company_name: Ray White Pittwater Property - MONA VALE
description:
This private, beautifully-presented home, with captivating 180 degree views across Pittwater, is located in one of Bayview's most loved streets. An easy stroll to the Pittwater foreshore, cafes, restaurants and marinas whilst enjoying the tranquil lifestyle that Bayview has to offer. Surrounded by the natural beauty of mature bushland, this North facing, sun-filled residence is perfectly positioned at the end the cul-de-sac, perfect for families and downsizers looking for low-maintenance, coastal living. With two huge entertaining decks to enjoy, your time will be well spent relaxing while taking in the view.

Inside the two-level home, you'll love the warm and inviting open-plan living and dining space on the upper floor, featuring ambient gas fireplace, together with the recently renovated kitchen including convenient LeMans units and AEG induction cooktop. Wake up to water views from the spacious main suite, your own sanctuary complete with walk-in-robe and ensuite. On the lower level, the flexible floorplan presents self-contained, dual-living options for guests or older children, right on the doorstep to everything Bayview has to offer.

• Easy walking distance to the Pittwater foreshore including a number of marinas, cafes and restaurants to choose from.
• North-facing aspect complete with four-bedrooms plus study, three-bathrooms and flexible floorplan for self-contained guest accommodation.
• New Colourbond roof, blue gum timber floors, ducted air conditioning through out and energy-efficient gas heating.
• Double carport, lock up workshop and plenty of under-house storage.
• Keoride on-demand service connects with B-Line express CBD bus services in Mona Vale as well as short walk to 156 bus.
• Low maintenance grassed area great for kids and pets

What's close by:

• The Quays Marina, Gibsons Marina and 8 Knots cafe
• Pasadena and Church Point restaurants
• Rowland park, dog park & boat ramp
• Beautiful foreshore walk & Bayview golf course

Public Transport:

• 156 bus down the street as well as Keoride direct to B-Line
• School buses to PHS, Mater Maria and St Lukes
• Private school buses available to many top schools

Local Schools:

• Pittwater High + Mona Vale Primary
• Sacred Heart Primary + St Lukes
• Mater Maria, NBCS & Covenant Christian

What the owners love:

• Waking up to the view over Pittwater
• The feeling of space and privacy
• Walking distance to cafes at local marinas
• Almost all rooms have a view

Disclaimer: All information contained herewith is provided by third parties. We have obtained this information from sources we believe to be reliable, however we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Interested parties should make their own enquiries.
